channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Batteries de voitures électriques : pourquoi on régresse alors que la technologie progresse
item.description: En 2023, la durée de vie des batteries de voitures électriques s'améliorait. Mais les derniers chiffres de 2025 viennent de tomber, et c'est la douche froide : nous sommes revenus au niveau de 2020. Pourquoi cette régression soudaine ? C'est simple : nous rechargeons mal nos voitures.

item.title: Best External Hard Drive (2026): SSD to Store Data, Video & More
item.description: Need an ultrafast drive for video editing or a rugged option to back up your photos in the field? We’ve got a solution for every situation.

item.title: Fresh Samsung Galaxy S26 leak shows no sign of the Pro or Edge models – but these are the phones we think we will get
item.description: It looks as though Samsung is going to stick with its traditional approach when it comes to its 2026 flagship phones.

item.title: Papers Please but with zombies, a farming-based shoot-'em-up and other new indie games worth checking out
item.description: Welcome to our latest roundup of what's going on in the indie game space. Several neat-looking games arrived this week, we got release dates for several others that I'm really looking forward to and a brand-new Steam festival was announced. The Love, Romance, and Heartbreak Debutante Ball is said to be the first Valentine's Day-themed Steam festival. It'll run from February 13 to 20 and feature more than 100 games, including discounts and demos. A showcase will take place on February 13 at 1PM ET on the Sunny Demeanor Games YouTube channel too.Organizers say the festival includes a wide variet...

item.title: Tottenham vs West Ham Live Streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: We'll show you how to watch Tottenham vs West Ham in the Premier League with both Thomas Frank and Nuno Espirito Santo in desperate need of a win.

item.title: À peine sorti, le Xiaomi Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G a déjà 70€ en moins grâce à une remise et une ODR pour les soldes
item.description: Le tout récent Xiaomi Redmi Note 15 Pro entre déjà dans la danse des soldes. Avec un écran AMOLED, une étanchéité totale, une batterie de 6 580 mAh et une config solide portée par un SoC véloce. Son prix passe de 429 euros à 359 euros grâce à une remise couplée à une offre de remboursement chez Boulanger.

item.title: Reddit Has Thoughts on Paris Hilton Cookware. So Do We
item.description: I put two viral Paris Hilton-branded kitchen products to the test. I have some thoughts.

item.title: Should I Invest in SpaceX?
item.description: SpaceX could go public in 2026, potentially with the largest IPO in history. For this Giz Asks, we asked experts to weigh in on the potential risks and rewards of investing.

item.title: The 24 Best Shows on Amazon Prime, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Fallout, The Girlfriend, and The Mighty Nein are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: The Galaxy S26 may be coming, but it's actually a fantastic time to consider picking up a Galaxy S25 series device
item.description: Waiting for the Galaxy S26? There are still excellent deals on the Galaxy S25 series that are well worth considering this week.

item.title: I tested the new Amazon Fire TV Omni QLED TV, and it’s good overall for the money but bested by budget mini-LED TV competition
item.description: The Amazon Fire TV Omni QLED (2025) has decent picture quality and Alexa+, but comes up short against its competition when it comes to performance and features.

item.title: I'm surprised by these laptop deals in Best Buy's winter sale — here are the 9 best offers I'd buy with prices starting at $119
item.description: The Best Buy winter sale ends tomorrow, so I've picked out nine of the best laptop deals that are worth checking out if you're shopping for a new device this weekend.

item.title: 7 Best Mesh Wi-Fi Systems (2026), Tested in a Tech Reviewer's Home
item.description: Forget about patchy internet connections and dead spots in the house. These WIRED-tested multiroom mesh systems will get you online in no time.

item.title: US Hackers Reportedly Caused a Blackout in Venezuela
item.description: Plus: AI reportedly caused ICE to send agents into the field without training, Palantir’s app for targeting immigrants gets exposed, and more.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Kia Shows off the EV2, and Fujifilm Debuts New Instax Cameras
item.description: Plus: Fender rebrands its PreSonus music production app, Ricoh unveils a monochrome camera, and Omega has a new Speedmaster.

item.title: Worried about retirement? Consider a die with zero plan
item.description: Most financial planning assumes you’ll never have enough, but a good die with zero plan helps you enjoy what you’ve got. My grandmother never realized she was practicing a die with zero philosophy. She liked to give generous presents to her children and grandchildren on birthdays, gift-giving occasions—and whenever the mood struck her. I once asked her why she kept her loved ones so well-supplied in gifts, and she remarked, “Why should you be glad I’m dead?”...

item.title: Test de la Huawei Watch Ultimate 2 : une montre de luxe qui cache un véritable laboratoire de santé
item.description: Deux ans après sa première montre ultra haut de gamme, Huawei a lancé sa Huawei Watch Ultimate 2. Design massif et élégant, fonctions poussées pour la santé et suivi sportif avancé, voici son test complet.
